mapper.insert: insert into ALR_SALARY_STATEMENT_DTL_RECORD (DETAIL_ID, FILE_ID, STAFF_TYPE, STAFF_ID, NEED_ENDOWMENT_INS, NEED_UNEMPLOY_INS, NEED_MEDICAL_INS, NEED_INJURY_INS, NEED_BIRTH_INS, NEED_HABITATION_INS, BASE_SALARY, POSITION_VALUE, TRAVEL_ALLOWANCE) values (#{detailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needEndowmentIns,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needUnemployIns,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needMedicalIns,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needInjuryIns,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needBirthIns,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needHabitationIns,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baseSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{positionValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{travelAllowance,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.select: select DETAIL_ID, FILE_ID, STAFF_TYPE, STAFF_ID, NEED_ENDOWMENT_INS, NEED_UNEMPLOY_INS, NEED_MEDICAL_INS, NEED_INJURY_INS, NEED_BIRTH_INS, NEED_HABITATION_INS, BASE_SALARY, POSITION_VALUE, TRAVEL_ALLOWANCE from ALR_SALARY_STATEMENT_DTL_RECORD where DETAIL_ID = #{detailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
